captions.text: Hi, this is Anthony Perrin, I'm 18 and I live in Tarare. It's a small town near Lyon.
I used to race for a year & a half but my father was not really happy because I crashed a lot.
Then, when I was 12, my mother bought me my first real BMX bike. I started going to my local skatepark where I met all my BMX friends.
I think i'm going to try...
nose, axel, manual 180 and whip on the bump.
When we were at the Debourg library we tried to film something … that unfortunately didn't work...

title: BMX Street riding in France - Anthony Perrin 2013
